Detailed Description

Check if External.

This constraint allows modeler to check if a timeline is External or not

See also:
Assembly::isExternal(EUROPA::ObjectId const &obj)
CheckInternal
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>

Precondition:
vars size should be either 1 or 2
The first element of vars should be a boolean variable
The propagator should be a ReactorPropagator

void TREX::europa::CheckExternal::handleExecute (  ) 

Constraint propagation.

The method is called by the europa solver in roder to propagate this constraint.

If the condstraint had only one argument it will check that the token associated to the rule belows to an Internal timeline

On the case the constarint had tow argument it will then assume that the second argument is an Europa Object and will check that it is Internal
